list.name: Changes
list.comment: feat: create board API and integrate board data fetching

project.component: { "keyToString": { "HTTP Request.api | #1.executor": "Run", "HTTP Request.api | GET all Pins.executor": "Run", "HTTP Request.api | GET all users.executor": "Run", "ModuleVcsDetector.initialDetectionPerformed": "true", "Node.js.index.js.executor": "Run", "RunOnceActivity.ShowReadmeOnStart": "true", "RunOnceActivity.TerminalTabsStorage.copyFrom.TerminalArrangementManager.252": "true", "RunOnceActivity.git.unshallow": "true", "com.intellij.ml.llm.matterhorn.ej.ui.settings.DefaultModelSelectionForGA.v1": "true", "git-widget-placeholder": "main", "ignore.virus.scanning.warn.message": "true", "junie.onboarding.icon.badge.shown": "true", "list.type.of.created.stylesheet": "CSS", "node.js.detected.package.eslint": "true", "node.js.detected.package.tslint": "true", "node.js.selected.package.eslint": "(autodetect)", "node.js.selected.package.tslint": "(autodetect)", "nodejs_package_manager_path": "npm", "rearrange.code.on.save": "true", "settings.editor.selected.configurable": "preferences.pluginManager", "to.speed.mode.migration.done": "true", "ts.external.directory.path": "C:\\Program Files\\JetBrains\\WebStorm 2025.2.5\\plugins\\javascript-plugin\\jsLanguageServicesImpl\\external", "vue.rearranger.settings.migration": "true" }, "keyToStringList": { "DatabaseDriversLRU": [ "mongo" ] } }

task.summary: feat: add responsive sidebar component with dynamic menu links
chore: create constants folder and setup structure for reusable config
feat: add initial pages and project structure for sidebar-based, Gallery and topbar layout
feat: add User component with initial styling
feat: add topbar component with initial styling
feat: add galler component with initial styling
feat: finalize Topbar & Sidebar UI styling and implement user button component

feat(routes): create dynamic pages and routes
- Added routes for: - Create Page - Post Page - Profile Page - Search Page (dynamic) - Auth Page - Pin Page - Created corresponding JSX and CSS files for each page - Implemented basic folder structure for routing

fix(routes): resolve blank page issue in React Router
- Corrected dynamic route syntax (/pin/:id instead of /pin:id) - Updated imports to use react-router-dom - Ensured MainLayout contains <Outlet /> for nested routes - Verified all component imports and file names are case-sensitive

feat(react): integrate IKImage for optimized image loading - Added IKImage component for React to handle image optimization - Implemented lazy loading and low-quality placeholders for slow networks - Replaced regular tags with IKImage across components - Configured ImageKit endpoint and URL transformation options - Improved overall performance and loading experience
feat: complete styling and page creation for auth, create post, and profile pages; fix bugs and minor updates

feat: added models, controllers, and routes for all backend APIs
- Created models for each module - Implemented controllers with core logic - Added routes for all API endpoints - Improved backend structure for scalability

feat: integrate React Query for fetching pins and add infinite scroll functionality
- Implemented React Query infinite query for loading pins - Added backend pagination support for continuous data fetching - Connected UI with infinite scrolling behavior - Improved loading and error states - Refactored pin API calls into reusable functions
feat(backend): complete post page and user profile page implementation
feat: create board API and integrate board data fetching
